name: bbs.sjtu蓝色样式 - mod
description:
Just add https support. for the source code, pls go to http://userstyles.org/styles/20744

http://OpenGG.me/
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document url-prefix(https://bbs.sjtu.edu.cn/),url-prefix(https://bbs6.sjtu.edu.cn/),url-prefix(https://bbs.sjtu.cn/){body{background:#253960 url("data:image/png;base64,") top left repeat-x!important;color:#96450e!important}BODY.left{color:#fff!important}div#footcontent>table>tbody>tr>td{color:#8296ff!important;background:#000!important}b,font{color:#8296ff!important}PRE Textarea{background:#405882 url("data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQAKAJEAAFBmjVRqkGd9oQAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAABAAoAAAIEhIAJUQA7") top left!important;background-position:top right;background-repeat:no-repeat;white-space:pre-wrap;white-space:-moz-pre-wrap;white-space:-pre-wrap;white-space:-o-pre-wrap;word-wrap:break-word}FONT.c30{COLOR:#000!important}FONT.c31{COLOR:#e00000!important}FONT.c32{COLOR:#008000!important}FONT.c33{COLOR:#808000!important}FONT.c34{COLOR:#00f!important}FONT.c35{COLOR:#d000d0!important}FONT.c36{COLOR:#33a0a0!important}tr{background:transparent!important}TABLE,TH,P,SELECT{FONT-FAMILY:Verdana,Tahoma,sans-serif,宋体,微软雅黑;font-size:12px!important;color:#001aa9!important;background:#253960 url("data:image/png;base64,") top left repeat-x!important;color:#3232ff!important}input{color:#3232ff!important}a:link,a:active,a:hover,.link,a font[color="#008000"]{color:#82bdff!important}a:visited,.link:visited{color:#823264!important}div,td{color:#64c8fa!important;background-color:transparent!important}}
